resources.string:
This phone companion app was created for you to easily find and download application to your watch device. Wear OS API 27+ devices are supported.

Checking for Wear OS devices…

Please turn on Bluetooth connection, connect your Wear OS device and refresh this app.

This phone companion app was created for you to easily find and download application to your watch device. Wear OS API 27+ devices are supported.

You have no Wear OS devices connected to your phone at this time…

Please turn on Bluetooth connection, connect your Wear OS device and refresh this app.

This phone companion app was created for you to easily find and download application to your watch device. Wear OS API 27+ devices are supported.

Please click on the button below to install app to your watch device(s).

You can freely uninstall this mobile app :)
